game.name: Brian Adventures On The Beach
game.description:
A cute turtle Brian needs your guidance to swim through the fast waters of the river and get some food for him. Are you ready to show him the path towards his most loved food items? Join Brian Adventures On The Beach and be prepared to control a cute turtle grab all the fruits that are floating in the river! Make sure to keep him away from the deadly piranhas, stones, crocodiles and other enemies that could put his life into danger.

Your objective in this brand new adventure game is to help Brian to grab 3 shells and collect as much food as you can. He forgot to swim in the stream, but your guidance will surely help to make him remind about his ability and reaches to all the delicious eating items. The collection of shells will give him an extra life so do not miss them. Try to swim him safely and avoid of not becoming the food of crocodiles in this HTML5 platform game!

Select language, picture and get ready to have a wonderful adventure with Brian! The top middle portion of the screen will show you the status of the power of your character. Make sure to achieve the goal of your game before energy runs out. Complete the present stage and earn points to unlock other new levels in this fun casual adventure challenge! We are happy to help you find new games under the category of adventure-based challenges that are also free to play online, no download required.
